Description: Two body fragments of a core-formed glass vessel, the larger one from towards the conical-shaped lower part of the vase; translucent blue fabric glass with horizontal trails, now white, in bands on a dark background.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Turner Bequest Excavations, Amathus
Bibliographic references: Murray, Smith and Walters 1900 / Excavations in Cyprus (p. 122, Tomb 172)
